This NTR is pretty good as in it's not depressing if you actually think about it. The son found out, he came to his only best friend fucking his only family member, he confronted him and beat the shit out of him and accepted that his mom was happy being with his "friend". He then moved on with his life as a king should. And also, the blackmail aspect of this doujin is dumb. The mom did some modeling in an erotic magazine before her son was born and retired when he was. She raised him as a single parent and I'd say she did a good job raising him if he went to the best University in the country. OK, btw here my opinion about the story : We still don't know about Kenichi's fate in the future, will he being succes on his life? Or will he become laughing stock of society because the peoples know her mother's sex videos? Or maybe he got revenge to them? We still don't know yet. But I must say, the way Kenichi left his mother without looking back is so cool and the fighting scene just like shonen type manga, I like it so much.
